wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan David Salt (born 6 January 1991) is an English cricketer.  Salt is a right-handed batsman, but his bowling style is unknown.  He was born in Chester, Cheshire and was educated at Poole Grammar School.While studying for his degree in Law at Durham University, Salt made his first-class debut for Durham MCCU against Yorkshire in 2011.  In his only first-class match to date, Salt claimed a single wicket, that of Gary Ballance, for the cost of 93 runs in the match.
